ygData.subject: Re: PRisioners of Unicron

Injustice:  Instead of going to the mess hall, Injustice went to the 
mess hall to drown his troubles in energin.
Nightstrike: "Why you look so madn, Injustice?? have you a problem 
that you can't solve?"
Injustice:  "Yeah.  How to deal with femmes.  I want one, the same 
way Malice does.  I do not understand how he does it."
Nightstrike: "What femme do you like? Blacknightmare???"said 
Nightstrike
injustice:  "No, diffinetly not.  Perhaps Organics could be swayed.  
Hmmmm....."
Nighstrike: the male laughted and said "She? ohh come on, she hates 
you"
Injustice:  "Malice hated all of you with extreme prejustice before 
he was brainwashed."
nighstrike: "Unlucky we can't brainwash her, Unicron needs her... by 
now "
Injustice:  "Perhaps.  But wills are easily broken, we just have to 
find out how to make her a total slave."
Nightstrike: "True... but stillwe have to convince Unicron he must 
be more willing to find those renegades by now, instead have a 
servant more"said the male while he drank his energin"Besides.. 
Malice's brainwashed resulted wrong, he shouldnt' be so willing to 
repeat the same"
Injustice:  "Malice's brainwashing was a gamble, there was a high 
probablity that it would not have worked because of his unique 
physiology.  That is why it was not as big of a success than it 
could have been.
Nightstrike: "In this one situation it's the same"replied the 
male"She's strong like his bro, and she has an attachment here"
Injustice:  "That attachment is her weakness.  The bird boy is 
really the only thing keeping her defiant.  If we faked his demise, 
she would be a little more suseptable to control."
Nighstrike: "What are YOU???? suggestting?"said Nightstrike serious
Injustice:  "Make it look like the parrot kicked the bucket and let 
her find out when she goes to feed him.  She'll be crushed, she'll 
be too broke up over him she'll do anything."
Nighstrike: "Are YOU suggest me that"he lowed the vioce"I kill the 
parrot?"
Injustice:  "Not kill, just render him unconscious for a long time.  
Make it look like he is dead.  But don't kill him, Unicron might get 
a little angry."
Nightstrike: "What do you expect win with this farse, 
Injustice?"said coole the male"what would I win?"
Injustice:  "Favor of Unicron, more power, perhaps a slave willing 
to do ANYTHING we ask her to."
Nighstrike: "What if she left this base as soon as she belived that 
he's dead?"
Injustice:  "She can't.  She does not have security clearance, she 
wouldn't even open a minor security door.  She'd have to get a 
weapon and shoot her way out."
Nightstrike: The male didn't looked very convinced
Injustice:  "Do you have so little faith in your allies?  Why can't 
you believe me for once?" the clone demanded, becoming very annoyed.
Nightstrike: "Think this... if our little farse is discovered, she 
wont' cooperate or her cooperation would be hardest to get... and 
the only one who could do that to the parror, safely for him, is 
Hellplague, I'm not a tech..."
